name: Pitch Deck Presentation Template
description:
Freelandeck — Pitch Deck Presentation Template

by hanihusam


  • Do you struggle with giving presentations? 
  • Is your presentation file boring and lengthy? 
  • Do you require a reference in order to make an interesting presentation?


This pitch deck template is for you. Freelandeck is a creative pitch deck template for freelancers.


You can edit and customize as you need. This is a FREE LICENSE. You can use it for personal and commercial purpose. It's all yours.


———


Hey, if you're a Mac user and use Keynote as your presentation tool, I create this pitch deck on Keynote version as well. Here take a look!
